entry.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
entry.content: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

entry.title: homayunmmdy/MiniBlock: MiniBlock 2D is a lightweight, 2D game. The goal of this project is to improve Typescript skills while offering a fun, interactive experience for players. Whether you’re a gamer exploring blocky worlds or a developer honing your skills, MiniBlock 2D has something for you!
entry.content: MiniBlock 2D is a lightweight, 2D game. The goal of this project is to improve Typescript skills while offering a fun, interactive experience for players. Whether you’re a gamer exploring blocky worlds or a developer honing your skills, MiniBlock 2D has something for you!

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: IlanMoyal/moyal.js.test: A lightweight, dependency-free JavaScript testing utility. This project is framework-agnostic and usable in both browser and Node.js environments.

entry.title: error311/FileRise: 🗂️ Lightweight, self-hosted web-based file manager with multi-file upload, editing, and batch operations – built with PHP & JavaScript for seamless file and folder management (Docker & Unraid ready).

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: dbosch99/CuCu-PWA: A Progressive Web App (PWA) that allows users to upload their Instagram data (ZIP file) and discover who doesn’t follow them back. The app is lightweight, user-friendly, and works seamlessly on both desktop and mobile devices.

entry.title: AymenSakouhi/proFile: **ProFile Lite** is a lightweight file upload and sharing app where authenticated users can upload files and share them via simple, secure links. This project is part of a learning stream to explore and implement modern web technologies in a hands-on way.
entry.content: **ProFile Lite** is a lightweight file upload and sharing app where authenticated users can upload files and share them via simple, secure links. This project is part of a learning stream to explore and implement modern web technologies in a hands-on way.
